text: Working on a little project in "drummer" that uploads a file to GitHub. I went to add the code to the server, and found it was already there. I traced my steps up the stack and found where the call is. Amazingly there's a complete Drummer verb set for GitHub, and even better, it's documented. Who wrote this? Me! I've been doing this too long. (Postscript: It wasn't exactly what I needed.)
